label: A2B3C6D_hP12_164_d_e_i_a-001
title: Kapellasite (Cu$_{3}$Zn(OH)$_{6}$Cl$_{2}$) Structure
comments:
Approximately 3\% of the OH radicals are replace by chlorine atoms.  We use ``O'' to represent all the OH/Cl sites. 
 (Krause, 2006) placed the zinc atom at the (1b) Wyckoff position, (0 0 1/2).  We shifted the origin of the structure so that the zinc atom is at the (1a) Wyckoff site.
